Sandy Hook, Orlando nightclub, San Bernadino, Boston Marathon, etc., etc., all the same, government agencies conducting drills and simulations at the exact same time the alleged shooting occurs.  With the video and pictures of the  exercises in the backdrop, the controlled media and it's  crisis actors push the gun control agenda.  Think about this objectively:  do you really think this alleged shooter was allowed to buy weapons even after attracting so much attention ?  Why is video surveillance never released?  Why is there never a formal investigation completed?  Do you really think a student (Anthony Borges) could be shot fives times with a high power rifle and not bleed to death within minutes instead of collecting over $100,000 from a GoFundMe account ?  Do you really believe the cops stood around outside playing pocket pool while  a guy was inside shooting people?  Do you really think the alleged shooting happened on the same day as a planned, active shooter exercise by law enforcement?  Do you really think high school students could organize so quickly with media interviews, assemblies, campaigns, etc., just minutes following the alleged event without funding and pre-planning?
